SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.dao

Interface ITaxDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaxDao
public interface ITaxDao
The ITaxDao interface defines methods for Tax-related database operations such as retrieving tax details by ID, employee ID, and tax year. Implementing classes must provide concrete implementations for these methods.
Since:
2024-02-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Praveen Kumar Kuruba

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Tax
    getTaxById(int taxId)
    Retrieves a tax record by its ID from the database.
    List<Tax>
    getTaxesByEmployeeId(int employeeId)
    Retrieves all taxes associated with a specific employee from the database.
    List<Tax>
    getTaxesByTaxYear(int taxYear)
    Retrieves all taxes for a specific tax year from the database.

  • Method Details

    • getTaxById

      Tax getTaxById(int taxId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves a tax record by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      taxId - The ID of the tax to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Tax object if found, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • getTaxesByEmployeeId

      List<Tax> getTaxesByEmployeeId(int employeeId)
      Retrieves all taxes associated with a specific employee from the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom taxes should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Tax objects.

    • getTaxesByTaxYear

      List<Tax> getTaxesByTaxYear(int taxYear)
      Retrieves all taxes for a specific tax year from the database.
      Parameters:
      taxYear - The tax year for which taxes should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Tax objects.
